channel.title: Xbox360
channel.description: What games should I get for my 360? I currently have Gearsofwar2 and Halo3

item.title: Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

cod4/waw(waw is pretty good) gta4 and modern 2 when it comes out… also get the first gears cuz if u like gears 2 ull love gears 1

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360

item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“Burning Ash, post:35, topic:279496”]GoW2 ----Failz0rz
CoD: WaW ----Great
CoD: MW ----Great
CoD: MW2 ----Great
GTA4: ----Great

Note v1: I don’t know if you like sports games, but pretty much all sports games are excellent.

Note v2: Just a thought

-Burning Ash[/quote]
how can you say MW 2 is great its not even out yet idiot. Also im pretty sure its just called MW2 and not CoD MW2

item.title: Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @xcvxcv2 xcvxcv2
item.description:
@xcvxcv2 wrote:

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:18, topic:279496”][quote author=Eternalsad link=topic=368843.msg2794816#msg2794816 date=1243009563]
Fallout 3 is a great game, totally recommend it.
[/quote]
What do you do in Fallout3?[/quote]

its like oblivion but a future version of it

some games i recommend are cod4, waw is filled with stupid noobs

gears 2 might be annoying at first if you play against good people but you get better

halo 3 played that for a long time sorta old for me but lots of people love it its a good way to get started with shooters

im just got the game ufc it is awesome but i think it gets old quickly ( mostly nonxbox live is fun)

left 4 dead one of the best multiplayer games ive seen
very fun to play with your friends and will entertain you for hours

bad side there are glitches (not sure if they are patched yet)

if u get left 4 dead make sure you play the campain b4 xbox live or people will yell at you for not knowing where to go

castle crashers is one of my favorite games mostly because i mod it and hit 1 hit ko’s

and since you have xbox live make sure you have a wired mic

wireless i heard suchs because you need to charge it and its hard to find the xbox

Read full topic

item.title: Xbox360
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:1, topic:279496”]What games should I get for my 360?
I currently have Gearsofwar2 and Halo3[/quote]L4D aka > Left 4 Dead, its really cool. I tried it on a PC, its really fun and a very good game. Go to youtube.com then search for “Left 4 Dead gameplay” Then you can see it + its online to. You can play as human & Zombies.

Fallout 3 is a great game, totally recommend it.

What do you do in Fallout3?

Post nuclear war based game.
[/quote]
Very nice what type of online modes does it have?[/quote]

Yeah it’s like oblivion, but with guns and stuff. No online like sanga said.

A lot of people say oblivion is better, but regardless fallout 3 is a fun game.
